pr_title: [no ticket][risk=no] Puppeteer test: Filter Workspaces by Access Level

timeline.bodyText: Should the username and password be specified here? I couldn't get logged in when running the test locally (local UI & test API). If I remove username and password params, the test runs and passes.
timeline.author: dolbeew

replies.bodyText:
The main user puppetcitester6 is used in ci job but user doesn't have any workspaces with READER or WRITER role.
What's the page that you see when login is failing?
Test passed in ci job.
PASS  tests/workspace/workspace-filter-display.spec.ts (73.466 s)
  Workspaces Filter Select menu tests
    ✓ Display workspaces by access levels (73031 ms)
replies.author: aweng98

replies.bodyText: It fails at the login page:
replies.author: dolbeew

replies.bodyText: ^^ Failure due to wrong password in local .env file
replies.author: dolbeew
